#summary What you need to use this
#labels Featured,Phase-Requirements

== Depends on ==

 * [http://www.php.net/ PHP 4.3+]
 * [http://mysql.com MySQL 4+] or [http://www.postgresql.org/  PostgreSQL 7+]
 * [http://phpmailer.sourceforge.net PHPMailer](Included in Schoorbs Package)(LGPL)
 * [http://art.gnome.org/themes/icon/1100 Dropline Neu!-Icons](Included in Schoorbs Package)(GPL)
 * [http://dean.edwards.name/IE7/ IE7(a javascript library which fixes some bugs of IE <7)](Included in Schoorbs Package)(LGPL)

=== Only important for Development ===

 * [http://ch.tudelft.nl/~arthur/svn2cl svn2cl] for ChangeLog generation(new BSD)(Included in Schoorbs SVN)
 * [http://www.phpdoc.org/ PhpDocumentor] for Sourcecode documentation generation(LGPL)(Included in Schoorbs SVN)
 * [http://www.phpunit.de/ PHPUnit] for Unit Testing(new BSD)(installable through a PEAR channel: pear.phpunit.de) _The Tests only run on PHP5_
